Class DataCompress

java.lang.Object
com.xml.editor.DataCompress
public class DataCompress extends Object
The `DataCompress` class provides methods for performing compression and decompression using the Byte Pair Encoding (BPE) algorithm, as well as utilities for minification and map serialization. The class also provides methods to handle encoding and decoding of byte pairs, as well as converting maps to and from string representations.

  • Method Details

    • bytePairEncode

      public static String bytePairEncode(String input)
      Performs Byte Pair Encoding (BPE) on the input string.

      This method repeatedly finds the most common pair of adjacent characters and replaces them with a new symbol, creating a compressed version of the input string. The process continues until no common pair is found that appears more than once.

      Parameters:
      input - the input string to be compressed
      Returns:
      the compressed string after applying Byte Pair Encoding

    • bytePairDecode

      public static String bytePairDecode(String encoded, Map<String,String> pairs)
      Decodes a string that was encoded using Byte Pair Encoding (BPE).

      This method reverses the Byte Pair Encoding process, replacing the new symbols with the original character pairs using the provided mapping of pairs.

      Parameters:
      encoded - the encoded string to be decoded
      pairs - the mapping of new symbols to the original pairs used during encoding
      Returns:
      the decoded string

    • hashMapToString

      public static String hashMapToString(Map<String,String> map)
      Converts a map of key-value pairs to a string representation.

      The map is serialized into a string format where each entry is represented as `key:value`, and entries are separated by commas, with the entire list enclosed in curly braces.

      Parameters:
      map - the map to be converted to a string
      Returns:
      a string representation of the map

    • stringToHashMap

      public static Map<String,String> stringToHashMap(String pairs)
      Converts a string representation of pairs into a map of key-value pairs.

      This method parses a string of the form `{key1:value1,key2:value2,...}` and returns a corresponding map of key-value pairs.

      Parameters:
      pairs - the string representation of pairs
      Returns:
      a map representing the pairs

    • minify

      public static String minify(String s)
      Minifies a string by removing all whitespace characters.

      This method is a simple compression technique that removes spaces from the input string.

      Parameters:
      s - the string to be minified
      Returns:
      the minified string with all spaces removed
